content.question: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 0, of, the fraction with numerator 5 raised to the x power, minus 1, and denominator x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="5 times, the natural log of 5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow></math>
